title: Wavve
description: Mobile application for creating and joining events where hosts can monetize by organizing billed parties.

title: GlowPay
description: A comprehensive itemshop solution for Minecraft servers that provides easy integration and free website hosting for server owners. Part of FVST Collective.

title: hostzone (private)
description: A modern rework of the Pterodactyl panel built with React and Next.js, fetching and displaying server data from the Pterodactyl API.

title: alienMusic
description: Discord music bot ranked #3 in Poland, providing high-quality music streaming for Discord servers.

title: FVST Collective
description: A collection of smaller application-like projects without a general website, bringing together various development initiatives under one umbrella.

title: Rean Bot
description: Private Discord bot with whitelist functionality, providing exclusive features for authorized servers only.
